name: MobileDataforce
overview: MobileDataforce, Inc. designs, develops, and deploys enterprise class and business critical software solutions for use on mobile handheld computers. Its products include FieldSync, a turnkey mobile solution that includes mobile, office, and data synchronization software needed to start doing business immediately in the field. The companyâ€™s solutions comprise custom mobile business and field software solutions, such as photo capture and sync, order entry, dispatch, functional acknowledgement, CC order and acceptance, and GPS data capture solutions. Its solutions are used in smart phones, tablet personal computers, portable digital assistants, and laptops. MobileDataforce, Inc. offers its solutions to automotive, healthcare/clinical, field service, utilities, inspections, and engineering sectors. MobileDataforce, Inc. was formerly known as I Resources Inc. and changed its name in January 2005. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Boise, Idaho with additional offices in Den Bosch, the Netherlands and Sydney, Australia.

funding_rounds.source_description: MobileDataforce Inc. Attracts $1 Million Investment by Minneapolis Based Private Investment Firm
